For the last 10 years, we have all been equally involved in making decisions. This triumvirate approach has real benefits in terms of shared wisdom, and we will continue to discuss the big decisions among the three of us. But we have also agreed to clarify our individual roles so there's clear responsibility and accountability at the top of the company. Current CEO Eric Schmidt will become`` executive chairman,'' Google said. Eric Schmidt has put his foot in his mouth so far on key issues like privacy that he's kicked himself out of the CEO's office, said John Simpson , director of Consumer Watchdog's Inside Google Project. Consumer Watchdog looks forward to engaging with Larry Page as he assumes his new role and discussing consumer issues like protecting consumers' online privacy.
